name: The Hand That Feeds
description:
Game made for the Philly Dev Night Cute / Gross Jam. Ran out of time so didn't get sfx in, or my fancy background and win screen idea, boo. This'll do.

Programming: @andreimarks (Andrei Marks)

Art: @thatcotter (Andrew Cotter)

Controls
  • Swing the hand with the left/right or a/d keys.
  • Pick up food with the space bar, then throw with the space bar.
